package.name: Fabric 2.
package.shortDescription: Lock screen customization manager for iOS 13.

descriptionlist.description: Fabric 2 will help you customize the display of time, date and weather on the lock screen. It is written exclusively for iOS13 and contains about 80 user settings. Key features: -Custom alignment. -Use of capital letters. -Customized size. -Hiding shortcuts. -Add a weather icon. -Custom interval. -Custom colors. -Dynamic colors (based on wallpaper color). -Quick color customization from the lock screen. -Custom format (also includes weather and device information). -Custom fonts (you can also add your own fonts). -Position of elements. -Respring is not required to change settings..
